      Source code for test.pipeline.test_features

      import skimage.color
import numpy as np
from pipeline.feature import Feature



      [docs]class RGBToGray(Feature):
    def __init__(self):
        Feature.__init__(self, 'grayscale', frame_op=True)


      [docs]    def extract(self, RGB_frame):
        return skimage.color.rgb2gray(RGB_frame)
      



      [docs]class BatchOP(Feature):
    def __init__(self):
        Feature.__init__(self, 'batch_length', batch_op=True)


      [docs]    def extract(self, batch):
        return len(batch)
      



      [docs]class ArgMaxPixel(Feature):
    def __init__(self):
        Feature.__init__(self, 'max_pixel', frame_op=True)


      [docs]    def extract(self, frame):
        return np.max(frame)
